analysis.description:
BellaBluToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/38/0x21c37e05b484ca36b4e4477d8c2c9d48d792a15c.sol#123) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x21c37e05b484ca36b4e4477d8c2c9d48d792a15c.sol#232-244)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/38/0x21c37e05b484ca36b4e4477d8c2c9d48d792a15c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/38/0x21c37e05b484ca36b4e4477d8c2c9d48d792a15c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/38/0x21c37e05b484ca36b4e4477d8c2c9d48d792a15c.sol#100) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_recipient' of BellaBluToken.destroyAndSend (/unique_chucks/38/0x21c37e05b484ca36b4e4477d8c2c9d48d792a15c.sol#253) is not in mixedCase
